sentences.english: Yajing capsule did not increase the ingredients side-effect related with drug combination.
sentences.chinese: 雅靜膠囊並不因組方聯合而增加各自的不良作用。

sentences.english: Call four elder brother dine Lan Hui to do of nice, don't let friendship quiet come in.
sentences.chinese: 叫四阿哥只吃瀾惠做的就好，別讓雅靜進門了。

definition: clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
sky clears after rain/new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom)/every cloud has a silver lining (idiom)/see also 雨過天晴|雨过天晴[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing2]

lit. three humble visits to a thatched cottage/cf famous episode in the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义 in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (the Hidden Dragon 臥龍|卧龙) to his cause by visiting him three times
Garden of Many Flowers (name)/Baihua garden in Hongmiao village 洪廟村|洪庙村[Hong2 miao4 cun1], Shandong
water flea (small crustacean of genus Daphnia)
high-quality ink stonemade in Duanxi and Guangdong
standing above the common crowd (idiom); outstanding/excellent and unrivaled
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
